author: Staff Reporter
Karthik Madhavan
text:
RELIGION

Bharatiya Vidya Bhavan: Talk on ‘Devarathil samudaya seerthiruthangal,’ 6 p.m.

CSI Christ Church: Lent prayer, 6.30 p.m.

Arulmigu Rathina Vinayagar Thirukoil, R.S. Puram: Sankatahara Chathurthi, 6.30 p.m.

CULTURE

Kasthuri Sreenivasan Trust: Artists’ meeting, 10 a.m.

GENERAL

The Coimbatore Productivity Council: Training programme, 9.30 a.m.

Government Arts College: Sports events, 10 a.m.

Nairs Educational Institutions: Mupperum Vizha, 3 p.m.

Sapna Book House: Face-to-face with writer Indira Parthasarathy, noon.

Class of 86, PSG College of Technology: Book release, 4 p.m.

GRG School of Management Studies: Entrepreneurship event, 9 a.m.

Nehru Arts and Science College: Film festival, 10 a.m.

Maharaja Arts and Science College: Technowizard 2k16, 10 a.m.; Child labour awareness programme, 2 p.m.

Nehru Institute of Information Technology and Management: Confluence-2016, 10 a.m.

Sri Ramakrishna Engineering College: Entrepreneurship week, 11 a.m.; SREC Bazaar, 9 a.m.

AJK Group of Educational Institutions: Inter-collegiate management meeting, 9.30 a.m.

Coimbatore Institute of Management and Technology: Workshop, 9.30 a.m.

Dr. R.V. Arts and Science College: National Science Day, 2.30 p.m.

FICCI flo: Sadhana 2016, Zone by the Park, 6 p.m.

Karpagam College of Engineering: Executive interaction programme, 2 p.m.

Karunya University Business School: Management development programme, 10 a.m.

Dr. G.R. Damodaran College of Science: CEO’s words series, 9.30 a.m.

Sri G.V.G. Visalakshi College for Women: Annual sports day, 11 a.m.

UDHAGAMANDALAM

Indian Institute of Soil and Water Conservation Research Centre: Farm innovators day, Kadasolai village, Kil Kothagiri, 10.30 a.m.

Vote for Ooty: Meeting, YMCA, 11 a.m.

TIRUPUR

Angel College of Engineering: Workshops on ‘Research paper writing skills,’ and ‘PCB designing,’ 9.30 a.m.

Professional Group of Institutions, Palladam: Job fair, 9 a.m.

Jay Shriram Group of Institutions: Workshop on personality skill, 9.30 a.m.
title: COIMBATORE TODAY
